    • setCrown

      public void setCrown()
      Replaces the default user icon with an icon of the "owl with crown".

    • setImage

      public void setImage(int turnIndex)
      Sets the user icon with a predefined icon based on the player's turn index.
      Parameters:
      turnIndex - The player's turn index, which determines its user icon.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(PlayerColor color)
      Sets the player button color.
      Parameters:
      color - The player's color choice.

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets whether this is grayed out and does not appear clickable.
      Parameters:
      active - Whether this button should be grayed out and not clickable.

    • setActions

      public void setActions(OtherPlayerInfoController otherPlayerInfoController, AtomicReference<OtherPlayerInfoController> currentlyShowingOtherInfo)
      Sets the button's click event action.
      Parameters:
      otherPlayerInfoController - The controller for the element to show when this button is clicked.
      currentlyShowingOtherInfo - A reference to the element that is already being shown and that should be hidden when this new element is displayed.

    • setOnMouseClicked

      public void setOnMouseClicked(javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> handler)
      Sets the button's click event action to be handled by the given EventHandler.
      Parameters:
      handler - The event handler.

    • setDisabled

      public void setDisabled(boolean disabled)
      Sets whether this button is disabled.
      Parameters:
      disabled - Whether this button is disabled.
